World","x":25,"y":487,"ins":[],"inNames":[],"outNames":[],"params":{"text":"Wave selector shaper
--------------------

Here I've tried to create a new waveform function by selecting which Sine freq. (1 or 1.501) should be played according the level (between -1 and +1) of the saw osc.

The "if" (higher than) function depends on 3 (min, middle, high) variable numbers.

The rest is cosmetics.

Enjoy, 

(a or not b)"}}}}
